verbs.description: It [V: is] [ARG2: abundantly clear] [ARG1: why President Trump wants to identify any spies involved in his 2016 presidential campaign . He wants to hire them to run his 2020 campaign .] -- Larry Tibbles , Heppner

It is abundantly clear [ARGM-CAU: why] [ARG0: President Trump] [V: wants] [ARG1: to identify any spies involved in his 2016 presidential campaign] . He wants to hire them to run his 2020 campaign . -- Larry Tibbles , Heppner

It is abundantly clear why [ARG0: President Trump] wants to [V: identify] [ARG1: any spies involved in his 2016 presidential campaign] . He wants to hire them to run his 2020 campaign . -- Larry Tibbles , Heppner

It is abundantly clear why President Trump wants to identify [ARG1: any spies] [V: involved] [ARG2: in his 2016 presidential campaign] . He wants to hire them to run his 2020 campaign . -- Larry Tibbles , Heppner

It is abundantly clear why President Trump wants to identify any spies involved in his 2016 presidential campaign . [ARG0: He] [V: wants] [ARG1: to hire them to run his 2020 campaign] . -- Larry Tibbles , Heppner

It is abundantly clear why President Trump wants to identify any spies involved in his 2016 presidential campaign . [ARG0: He] wants to [V: hire] [ARG1: them] [ARG2: to run his 2020 campaign] . -- Larry Tibbles , Heppner

It is abundantly clear why President Trump wants to identify any spies involved in his 2016 presidential campaign . He wants to hire [ARG0: them] to [V: run] [ARG1: his 2020 campaign] . -- Larry Tibbles , Heppner
